name: Shelly's Golden Room
description:
Formerly a turn-of-the-century sitting room/parlor, now converted to a large bedroom in our renovated historic home.
Perfect for a pre-flight overnight, late night arrival, or an ideal base to explore all Boston has to offer.
Full usable kitchen.
One minute walk to Wood Island subway, 5 minutes to/from airport, 10 minutes to downtown Boston - a convenient, ideal place for an airport stop-over.
Free on-street parking.
$15 charge for extra guests.
Check in is 2PM.
Early bag drop off welcome.

Other things to note
Safe on-street parking is available. Parking lot around the corner also available.

License number
STR-398249
